frame.name: Control
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Controlling_entity</fen>, <fen>Controlling_situation</fen>, or <fen>Controlling_variable</fen> control a <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>. The latter, dependent, element or some aspect of it is not just influenced, but determined by the controlling element.
<ex>Can <fex name="cone">you</fex> <t>control</t> <fex name="depe">the robot</fex>?</ex> <ex>Although <fex name="cone">you</fex> may not be able to <t>control</t> <fex name="deps">every situation</fex>, you can control your reaction.</ex> <ex><fex name="cone">Students</fex> do not <m>have</m> <t>control</t> <fex name="depv">over the temperature of the heating water</fex>.</ex> <ex>Everyone knows that <fex name="conv">the price of oil</fex> <t>controls</t> <fex name="depv">the price of asphalt</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Controlling_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>A thing or person whose behavior controls a <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity, usually a thing, that is influenced in its behavior by a <fen>Controlling_entity</fen> or an <fen>Controlling_situation</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Controlling_variable
FE.definition: <def-root>A scalar variable (with unspecified value) which has an effect on the <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>A situation whose temporal or other characteristics are influenced by a <fen>Controlling_entity</fen>, <fen>Controlling_situation</fen>, or <fen>Controlling_variable</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_variable
FE.definition:
<def-root>A scalar variable, whose value depends on the behavior of a <fen>Controlling_entity</fen>, a <fen>Controlling_situation</fen>, or a <fen>Controlling_variable</fen>.
<ex>Move the slider on the SpeedBar while playing audio or video material to <t>control</t> <fex name="depv">playback speed</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Controlling_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>A situation whose temporal or other characteristics control a <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fex name="deg">Degree</fex> to which the Controlling element affects the Dependent element.
</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="tim">Time</fex> at which the controlling occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the controlling occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Influencing_entity</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully). </def-root>

lexUnit.name: control.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to (primarily) determine various features of some situation or entity.

lexUnit.name: determine.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cause to occur in a particular way; be the decisive factor in.

lexUnit.name: control.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the power that a person or entity has over someone or something

lexUnit.name: command.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to have or exercise control (/authority) over some entity or situation

lexUnit.name: command.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the possession or exercise of controlling authority

lexUnit.name: regulate.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to control by a rule, principle or method

lexUnit.name: regulation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a law, rule, or other order prescribed by authority, especially to regulate conduct
